# SKOverlay.Position

**Enumeration**

Constants that identify the position of an overlay on the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Position
```

## Describing the Overlay’s Position

- **SKOverlay.Position.bottom**: Specifies that the overlay is at the bottom of the screen.
- **SKOverlay.Position.bottomRaised**: Specifies that the overlay is at a raised position at the bottom of the screen.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Creating an App Clip Configuration

- **init(position:)**: Creates an object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend an App Clip’s corresponding app.
- **position**: The position of the overlay on the screen.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
